轏字的基本解释

轏
zhàn
古代用竹木条做成的车：“丑父寝于轏中。”亦称“栈车”。

轏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhàn］
［《廣韻》士限切，上産，崇。］
栈车。用竹木制成的车子。

轏字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　轏； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1248第33
同輚。【廣韻】車名。【正韻】兵車，又臥車。【左傳·成二年】逢丑父寢于轏中。餘詳輚字註。

考證：〔【左傳·成二年】逢丑父寢于轏車。〕　謹照原文轏車改轏中。
轏字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
轏字的起名意思

暂无。

Shu
Basic explanation of words
Shu
zhàn
A cart made of bamboo and wood strips in ancient times: "The ugly father slept in the middle of the river." Also known as the "stack cart".
Shu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhàn］
["Guangyun" scholars limit cutting, high production, Chong. ]
Stack truck. A car made of bamboo wood.
Shu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Che Zi Department] 　轏; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1248 33
The same thing. [Guangyun] The name of the car. [Zhengyun] Soldier chariot, lying chariot again. [Zuo Zhuan·Two Years] Every ugly father slept in Shuzhong. Yu Xiangzi notes. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·Two Years] Every ugly father slept in Shuche. 〕　I would like to change the car according to the original text.
Shu
